name: öde
description:
öde

öde is a short infinite exploration "game" (or maybe a demo or something...) made for PROCJAM 2015.

This game and its source code is under the MIT license.

Warning

The game currently has some minor issues on Windows : mainly graphic glitch on particles. It is recommended to disable the particles on this system for the time being.

Instructions

Access the game with your browser (only Chrome and Firefox are supported).

Its source code is accessible on Github.

History
  • 2015-11-19 : Fix the camera bobbing / clipping issue when the frame rate drops, fix several issues relative to the inputs and much lighter production builds.
  • 2015-11-14 : First release
